description.text: This experiment is the same as #yquot#01_ExampleSource.xml#yquot#. The attribute values contain more than one string. In this case the values are not separated by a tabular or another character which is not contained in the attribute values, but are grouped by quotes. This must be indicated by using the ExampleSource parameter #yquot#use_quotes#yquot#. However, since quoting might slow down the data reading, it is not recommended to use quotes at all.
